Harry Bowen (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Bowen_(actor) 0 Michael Bowen (born June 21, 1957) is an American actor. He is best known for portraying Danny Pickett on the ABC series Lost and Jack Welker on the AMC series Breaking Bad. Michael_Bowen ( born June_21_,_1957 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for portraying Danny_Pickett on the_ABC_series_Lost_and_Jack_Welker on the_AMC_series Breaking Bad .
